s:scufl.s:workflowdescription:
Given a sequence or sequence entry identifer (e.g. uniprot:wap_rat), return the sequence in fasta format.
If a sequence identifier, in database:identifier format, is input the EBI's WSDbfetch web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/dbfetch) is used to retrive the sequence in fasta format. Otherwise the input is assumed to be a sequence and if passed through the Soaplab EMBOSS seqret service to force the sequence into fasta format.

s:processor.name: Is_sequence
s:processor.s:description: Return true if the input is a sequence or false if the input is a sequence identifer (e.g. uniprot:wap_rat).

s:processor.name: Fail_if_identifer
s:processor.s:description: Fails if the workflow input is an identifier (i.e. is an actual sequence).

s:processor.name: Fail_if_sequence
s:processor.s:description: Fails if the workflow input was a sequence (i.e. is an identifer).

s:processor.name: fetchData
s:processor.s:description: Fetch the sequence in fasta format from the identifer using EBI's WSDbfetch service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/dbfetch).

s:metadata.s:description: Either an actual sequence or an entry identifer in database:identifier format (e.g. uniprot:wap_rat).
